Text.Page: Paesyn tried to atone for Zolyn's capture, but ended up needing his own rescue. You calmed him down and helped get the supplies to Tempest Outpost.
Paesyn went ahead. Crazy furball kept saying 'It's my fault. It's all my fault.'<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Where did he go?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

He grabbed those wrenches of his and charged across the valley, sabertooths be damned. Maybe he went to protect the supply wagons.

Watch out for him. Great engineer, but not much of a fighter.

! I-I wanted to save her. I wanted to protect Zolyn, but I failed.

My heart feels so heavy. I'm no hero. I just like to tinker with mechanical things. It's my fault she was captured."No, it's not."

Yes, it is. She needed a hero, not a friend.

I bet we can find her together, though. You're strong and I'm brave, at least a little bit.

Let's get these wagons moving, then find Zolyn.
(Various mechanical parts lie inside. They look like they would fit an airship.)

Thanks for getting the supplies to us. Our airships have been grounded and we're losing ground to the archdevas.

Now, we are ready.
